prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a large blue body and impressive horns.
Imagine a powerful fighter Pokemon that can lift heavy objects with its claws.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and has a distinctive horn.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a beetle, with bright colors and an intimidating stance.
Design a Pokemon that is known for its strength and is often found in grasslands.
Make a fierce-looking blue insect Pokemon that evolves from a smaller creature.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique blend of blue and red colors, showcasing its battle-ready stance.
